goal1: The student will improve writing skills by reviewing and correcting grammatical and spelling errors in their academic writing with at least 80% accuracy in 3 out of 4 drafts.
goal2: The student will enhance reading fluency to support overall literacy development.
goal3: The student will develop reading comprehension skills to better understand and analyze texts.
goal4: The student will improve math problem-solving abilities to effectively tackle mathematical challenges.
goal5: The student will strengthen executive functioning skills to better manage time, organize assignments, and meet deadlines.
